Description: Psychometric synonym score (Highly positively correlation). Innitially, critical value has to be determined. Threshold value that yields in at least 30 correlated pairs is appropriate for a relavant calculation. Questionnaires whose Psychsyn score is around 0 or negative are considered to be careless responders.

Psychometric antonym score (Highly negatively correlation). Similar procedure as it is for Psychsyn, the only difference is that questionnaires whose Psychant score is around 0 or positive are considered to be careless responders.
The longest sequence of identical consecutive responses for each questionnaire.
The average length of identical consecutive responses for each questionnaire
